title: Austin Suggs on his journey and the story of Gospel Simplicity
description:
Austin Suggs is the host of the wonderful youtube channel "Gospel Simplicity". We talked about his faith journey, the story of how he made his youtube channel, the curiosity of many evangelicals in older Christian traditions, and the future evangelicalism. Austin is a wonderful guy and I hope you will enjoy this interview and go and check out his channel.

Gospel Simplicity: https://www.youtube.com/c/GospelSimplicity

Podcast version of this episode: https://anchor.fm/transfigured-sam/episodes/Austin-Suggs-on-his-journey-and-the-story-of-Gospel-Simplicity-e182h53

00:00 - Introduction
01:20 - Austin's faith background
09:20 - The history of Austin's youtube channel
17:00 - What's with the interest in the ancient church?
22:45 - What's wit the dissatisfaction in evangelicalism?
30:00 - What does the future of evangelicalism look like?
37:20 - What is the importance of the Lord's Supper?
40:30 - Can evangelicalism plunder the goods of Catholicism and Orthodoxy?
42:40 - What's the future of Gospel Simplicity
47:00 - Austin's hobbies
49:10 - Ideal interview guests
